name: aframe-site
description: A-Frame: Building Blocks for the Web

scripts.minify: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-css: crass public/css/style.css > public/css/style.min.css && rm public/css/style.css && mv public/css/style.min.css public/css/style.css
scripts.minify-js: uglifyjs public/js/main.js > public/js/main.min.js && rm public/js/main.js && mv public/js/main.min.js public/js/main.js
